name: webtech-i1h-2017
description: Repo for course WebTech voor HAN - ICA - I1H najaar 2017

scripts.prestart: mkdir -p lib && cp node_modules/fullcalendar/dist/*.*  lib/ && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js lib/ && cp node_modules/moment/moment.js lib/ && cp node_modules/bulma/css/bulma.css lib/ && cp node_modules/fullcalendar/dist/gcal.min.js lib/ && cp node_modules/fullcalendar/dist/locale/nl.js lib/

author: Bart van der Wal
